text: Smallfoot is a 2018 American computer-animated musical comedy movie. ==Production== It was produced by the Warner Animation Group and distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures. The story is based on the unpublished children's book Yeti Tracks by Sergio Pablos. The movie was co-written and directed by Karey Kirkpatrick. ==Release== Smallfoot was theatrically released in the United States on September 28, 2018. It received a mostly positive reception from critics and grossed over $214 million worldwide. ==Plot== The plot follows a tribe of Himalayan Yeti who come across a human being, with each species thinking the other was just a myth. ==Voice cast== The movie stars the voices of Channing Tatum, James Corden, Zendaya, Common, LeBron James, Gina Rodriguez, Danny DeVito, Yara Shahidi, Ely Henry, and Jimmy Tatro. * Channing Tatum as Migo * James Corden as Percy Patterson * Zendaya as Meechee ** Jennifer Hale as Meechee's singing voice (uncredited) * Common as Stonekeeper * LeBron James as Gwangi * Gina Rodriguez as Kolka * Danny DeVito as Dorgle * Yara Shahidi as Brenda * Ely Henry as Fleem * Jimmy Tatro as Thorp * Patricia Heaton as Mama Bear ==References== Category:Warner Animation Group movies Category:Warner Bros. Animation movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:2018 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:2018 computer-animated movies Category:American computer-animated movies Category:American 3D animated movies
title: Smallfoot (movie)
